entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 3 except 8 near Pemberton.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with wet snow late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3 except 8 near Pemberton. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
